title: Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI
author: samke-
aiHeadline: Breaking News: Someone Finally Combined CSS and Counter Strike 1.6, Because Who Needs Productivity When You Can Have Nostalgia, Introducing Cs16.css, the CSS Library That Will Make You Forget About Your Deadline and Take You Back to the Good Old Days of Gaming

title: Wild – A fast linker for Linux
author: hkalbasi
aiHeadline: Linux Users Rejoice: Wild, the Fast Linker, Has Arrived, Because Who Doesn't Love a Good Game of 'Let's See How Fast We Can Compile This Code', and With Wild, You'll Be Able to Do Just That, Plus It's Open-Source, So You Can Contribute to the Speediness

title: The State of Vim
author: signa11
aiHeadline: The State of Vim: Still Relevant, Still Used by Developers Who Refuse to Acknowledge the Existence of Other Text Editors, and Honestly, Who Can Blame Them, Vim is Like That One Pair of Jeans That You Just Can't Seem to Get Rid Of, No Matter How Many Newer, Shinier Text Editors Come Out

title: Build It Yourself
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: Build It Yourself, They Said, It'll Be Fun, They Said, But Little Did You Know, You'd End Up Spending Hours Upon Hours of Your Valuable Time Trying to Fix That One Bug That Just Won't Go Away, But Hey, At Least You'll Have a Good Story to Tell, and Maybe, Just Maybe, You'll Learn Something New

title: Ask HN: Why buy domains and 301 redirect them to me?
author: HughParry
aiHeadline: The Age-Old Question: Why Buy Domains and 301 Redirect Them to Me, Is It for the LOLs, Is It for the Money, or Is It Just a Cry for Help, and If So, Can Someone Please Redirect This Person to a Therapist, Because This Behavior Is Just Plain Confusing, and We Need Answers
